about_the_game:
Aery – Piece of Mind is an interactive game experience that is designed to relax your mind and soul. You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.



Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying.
It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.

Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don’t have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.

This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.
We hope you like them. So lean back and take a deep breath…

Gameplay


The game starts with a level selection screen where you can choose between many different levels.
Once you select the level the actual game starts with a short preview of the level and a little bird who starts flying into the beautiful environment of the level.

The controls are very smooth and it’s easy to navigate the little bird wherever you want it to go. The main task of each level is to collect a certain amount of memory diamonds that the little bird lost in the unknown wolds. The position of the diamonds is randomized to make each playthrough more interesting and to keep the game fun even if the player plays the level for the 10th time. Since the game is aiming to deliver an enjoyable and relaxing time for the player this is especially important as people who enjoy the game will most likely play their favorite level a lot.

After the little bird starts its journey in the area the player will soon realize that the game is very peaceful and overall, not difficult at all. There are no enemies or any kind of danger and if the player crashes into an obstacle they are simply reset to the position of the last diamond. Collecting the memory diamonds is easy and fun and makes up for a short and enjoyable experience. The player doesn’t need to think too much and can simply enjoy the experience and the beautiful and stylized environments. Once the player collects a certain number of diamonds the level is finished and the player can freely choose a new stage.

This serves to make sure that the player is most comfortable and slowly becomes calmer and more relaxed. The game aims to release the stress of their daily life and is designed to give them a quiet and enjoyable moment in their otherwise hasty lives.
